title: Apollo 11: First Moon Landing
description: Apollo 11 landed the first humans on the Moon in 1969, marking a pivotal moment in human spaceflight.

title: Voyager 1: Interstellar Traveler
description: Voyager 1 is the farthest human-made object from Earth and continues to transmit data from interstellar space.

title: James Webb Space Telescope
description: JWST observes the universe in infrared, revealing early galaxies and star formation.

title: Europa: Ocean World
description: Jupiter’s moon Europa likely hosts a subsurface ocean beneath an icy crust.

title: Sagittarius A*
description: The Milky Way’s central supermassive black hole has a mass of about 4 million Suns.

title: Exoplanets
description: Thousands of planets have been discovered around other stars using transits and radial velocity.
